entity.name: gene
entity.query: select q1.id, q1.species_id, q1.accession, q1.gi, q1.start, q1.stop, q1.strand, q1.sys_name, q1.name, q1.description, chromosome_id, num_conds, num_corems, num_gres from (select g.id, g.species_id, g.accession, g.gi, g.start, g.stop, g.strand, g.sys_name, g.name, g.description, g.chromosome_id, count(gc.id) as num_conds from main_gene g left outer join main_geneconditionmembership gc on g.id = gc.gene_id group by g.id, g.species_id, g.accession, g.gi, g.start, g.stop, g.strand, g.sys_name, g.name, g.description, g.chromosome_id) q1 left outer join (select cg.gene_id, count(cg.corem_id) as num_corems from main_corem_genes cg group by cg.gene_id) q2 on q1.id = q2.gene_id left outer join (select gg.gene_id, count(gg.gre_id) num_gres from main_gregenemembership gg group by gg.gene_id) q3 on q1.id = q3.gene_id

entity.name: species
entity.query: select s.name, s.short_name, s.ncbi_taxonomy_id from main_species s where s.id = ${gene.species_id}

entity.name: network
entity.query: select n.name, n.version_id from main_network n join main_species s on n.species_id = s.id where s.id = ${gene.species_id}
